title: Can anybody ID this type face??
content:
i found this type face on a sign on a wall in london, and want to find out what it is called? any help would be great.

thank you

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017184902im_/http:/typophile.com/files/IMG_0657_5837.JPG)
author: joelwbstephens

comments.content:
First, looks like a hand-lettering to me. All repeating letters are different (3 /S, 3 /E, 2 /R, 2 /P...).  
Second, I was unable to spot a font that could match all these specific letters. Looks like it mixes different styles of font (at least 2): /S (/T, /A, /L...) on one side and /P, /R, /O and /P on the other. May be mixing some of these ones would be interesting: [Highway](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017184902/http:/youngjerks.com/#/highway-typeface) (flare serif but overall design looks in the same vein), [Wyvern](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017184902/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/wyvern), [Railroad Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017184902/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/railroad-gothic-rr), [Maxwell Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017184902/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/kimmy/maxwell-sans), [CA Aires](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017184902/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/capearcona/ca-airespro), [Strassenbahn](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017184902/http:/www.tendollarfonts.com/strassenbahn), [Route 66](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017184902/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/route-66-nf), [Outer Loop](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017184902/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/outer-loop-nf), [SNV](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017184902/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/snv), [Highway](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017184902/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/highway) (Blue Highway, Highway Gothic, Interstate, Expressway...), [Signal](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017184902/http:/www.youworkforthem.com/font/T1052/signal), [SAA](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017184902/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/saa), [Monod](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017184902/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/monod), [Nomad](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017184902/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/coniglio/nomad), [Cougher](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017184902/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/context/cougher), [Van Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017184902/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/rsantos/van-condensed), [Inventory](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017184902/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/jnlevine/inventory), [Station](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017184902/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/kimmy/station)

hi Ryuk,

thanks for getting back to me, yeah i thought it might be a difficult one. as i thought the same my self. but it is worth putting it out there to see if any body prove me wrong. i shall have a look at those type faces you provided.

thank you very much for your help, appreciate it!

best

joel
